name: Devil's sacrifice
description:
You are captured by the devil in a dungeon and in order to get released you need to give him sarifices. You  have to kill zombies and  then drag the body by facing it and pressing H to take it to a kind of portal to mark it as sacrifised. But be warned thay can pack a real puch if you don't doge them!

Goal Drag the Dead body of the enemy by facing the dead body and  pressing 'H' to hold and take the body to the portal. Controls
  • W A S D or arrowkeys to move.
  • left click to attack
  • Once the enemy is dead you can drag the enemy by pressing 'H' to the portal
  • Once all the enemys has been sacrificed you will be taken to the next level
Credits
